content:
ber 1, 2016
Early Access Review
								So I expected a football (soccer for you Americans) game, where you can build some obstacles so your opponent can't score that easily. What I got was a football game, where I can just plant some stuff, place some NPCs (with a bad AI) und they are running around chasing the ball. There is a place with two goals, but it doesn't really matter if you or some of the AIs scores a goal. There is no sense in this game. I know it's in Early Access, but right now it is just a tech demo for an upcoming game, which MIGHT look and play good.


YouTube™ Video: Let's Try Footbrawl Playground 

			Views: 78		

			A few minutes of gameplay from the indie game "Footbrawl Playground".		

Right now I just can't recommend this at all. Weren't well spent 6 Euros..

y 15
Early Access Review
								The game doesn't really have a neat concept or anything like that, simply it's just futbol. Now, the game itself, IS HILARIOUS! It's fun to play with different settings on/off or just with a friend. It's just a playgroung for the physics of a future game, but still it's fun to play and that's all that really matters.
